summary: This is an internal jail communication dated July 30, 2019, regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein. It states that Epstein is being taken off of Psych Observation and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate. The document is part of a chain of emails with many recipients and acknowledgments.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate referenced in the communication, identified by his inmate number #76318-054, who is being taken off of Psych Observation and needs a new cellmate assignment.

events.title: Epstein taken off Psych Observation
events.description: An internal jail communication states that inmate Jeffrey Epstein is being taken off of Psych Observation and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate.

keyFacts: The document is dated July 30, 2019, just over two weeks before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
It records the decision to take Jeffrey Epstein off of Psych Observation and to house him with an appropriate cellmate.
The document is part of an email chain with a large number of recipients (71) and acknowledgments (27), indicating broad internal circulation of this status update.
